ygData.subject: Re: Kitting and magic
ygData.msgSnippet: ... kill is based on group basis damage if one group not individual make more damage it get a kill, but one group can be also one wizard, also you must note
ygData.messageBody:
At 15.51 07/07/99 -0400, you wrote:
>I have noticed quit a few people kiting in Oasis, the general response
>from the public is to just steal their kills (which is pretty easy with
>them running all over the place). Because of the need for a large open
>area you are pretty limited to where you can use this and in either
>case it is a clever combination of spells to kill a monster not a bug
>IMHO. If they implement anything new I would like to see the total
>damage of a party going to determine who gets the kill as opposed to
>the individual who did the most damage. This would help quit a bit in
>the kill stealing arena which is rather frustrating (particularly at
>High Pass Orc area).

kill is based on group basis damage if one group not individual make more
damage it get a kill, but one group can be also one wizard, also you must
note that in high hold are 3 or more groups casting spells on MOB so it is
needed much less damage to get kill and one hit of 20 lv wizard can do 177
damage it can be easy enough to get him a kill if more than 3 groups fight
over MOB. this problem is not of long time it ends nearly at lv 29 when
wizards dont have to much places and power to kill steal from others in
time without ding eheheh.
you can say that a wizard is in same situation before a lv 16 when nearly
any warrior class can steal from him ehehehehe.



>Merauk
>Level 21 Enchanter struggling Jeweler
>Cazic-Thule Server
>
